statements: UPDATE genomics_data SET gene_expression = 10.5 WHERE gene_name = 'ABC' AND pathway_name = 'Xyzzy';
UPDATE genomics_data SET pathway_activity = TRUE, gene_expression = 8.2 WHERE pathway_name = 'Jklm' AND gene_name = 'PQR';
UPDATE genomics_data SET gene_expression = 4.5, pathway_activity = TRUE WHERE gene_name = 'ABC' AND pathway_name = 'Pathway1';
UPDATE genomics_data SET pathway_activity = FALSE, gene_expression = 3.2 WHERE gene_name = 'XYZ' AND pathway_name = 'Pathway2';
UPDATE GenomicsData SET gene_name = 'Gene A' WHERE gene_id = 1;
UPDATE DrugTargets SET target_name = 'Target X', pathway_id = 2 WHERE target_id = 1;

UPDATE DrugTargets SET target_name = 'Target XYZ', gene_id = 2 WHERE target_id = 3;
UPDATE genomics_data SET gene_expression = 3.14 WHERE sample_id = 101;
UPDATE drug_targets SET target_name = 'New Target' WHERE target_id = 201;
UPDATE genomics_data SET gene_expression = 10.5, gene_name = 'ABC' WHERE sample_id = 1;
UPDATE drug_targets SET pathway_id = 3, target_name = 'XYZ' WHERE target_id = 2;

UPDATE gene_expression SET expression_level = 2.5 WHERE gene_id = 1;
UPDATE drug SET target_gene_id = 3 WHERE drug_id = 2;
